title: Systéme proposé par un réactionnaire pour les mieux isoler. (Actualités), from Le Charivari
text: The madness of women's fashion provided Daumier with numerous occasions to make fun of those who followed the vagaries of taste even when it was clearly ridiculous. Here, women make use of their giant hoop skirts to float like hot-air balloons above the city.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Charles C. Bovey, 1924
